post.title: This marriage advice from a 1948 magazine

body:
??? 

Have you ever made a mistake?  Ever regretted making that mistake?  Ever had to live with the consequences?  Premarital sex is a mistake I have to live with. 

And when did I say anything about her past?

*I regret my past before her.  I wish she was my only one.* Slow down a bit, turbo.
body_html:
???

Have you ever made a mistake? Ever regretted making that mistake? Ever had to live with the consequences? Premarital sex is a mistake I have to live with.

And when did I say anything about her past?

I regret my past before her. I wish she was my only one. Slow down a bit, turbo.

post.title: This marriage advice from a 1948 magazine

body:
All good.   What im trying to convey is that I love her enough to wish that I'd never had another partner.  Never another to compare,  never another to remember.   It's an honor I wish belonged only to her.   I don't beat myself up about it, but as I get older,  it's something I've come to realize.  It's a regret.   One I share in hopes that others will profit from my experience and not have to feel the same regret.  

Cheers!
body_html:
All good. What im trying to convey is that I love her enough to wish that I'd never had another partner. Never another to compare, never another to remember. It's an honor I wish belonged only to her. I don't beat myself up about it, but as I get older, it's something I've come to realize. It's a regret. One I share in hopes that others will profit from my experience and not have to feel the same regret.

Cheers!

body: Humans are hardwired to love women more and treat men more like machines. It has to do with which type of sexual organ there needs to be more of for the species to survive, but unfortunately it goes beyond just protection and causes unfair levels of sympathy for women (when compared to how men are treated) in every aspect of life. There's also the unfortunate fact that males are modified organisms designed solely for reproductive purposes, while females have other functions besides just reproduction and laboring.
body_html: Humans are hardwired to love women more and treat men more like machines. It has to do with which type of sexual organ there needs to be more of for the species to survive, but unfortunately it goes beyond just protection and causes unfair levels of sympathy for women (when compared to how men are treated) in every aspect of life. There's also the unfortunate fact that males are modified organisms designed solely for reproductive purposes, while females have other functions besides just reproduction and laboring.

post.title: This marriage advice from a 1948 magazine

body:
of course - I understood courtship to be the process leading up to marriage (like dating), and "making love" I understood as fornication or a sin

> Courtship is the period of development towards an intimate relationship wherein a couple get to know each other and decide if there will be an engagement, followed by a marriage.
body_html:
of course - I understood courtship to be the process leading up to marriage (like dating), and "making love" I understood as fornication or a sin

Courtship is the period of development towards an intimate relationship wherein a couple get to know each other and decide if there will be an engagement, followed by a marriage.
